title: Bless & Tim Celebrate Sonic Tuesday
description:
Our two Sonic mega fans come together to celebrate and hype up Sonic and friends ahead of the new movie releasing this week. Come enjoy the history and stories with Tim and Bless as they play through different sonic games across the generations.
